					 The Dec. 20 issue of the Cuban newspaper Granma said under the title "Korean people weeping bitterly over the loss of their leader."
					
					 The Korean people are stricken with bitter grief and sorrow over their leader's demise, the great loss. 
					
					 But they are now full of undisputed faith that Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, will lead Korean revolution to victory.

articles.title: Foreign Internet Homepages Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Internet Homepages Mourn Demise of Kim Jong Il

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries posted special write-ups on their Internet homepages on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il will always live in our hearts".
					
					 The article said:
					
					 We are wrapped in great sorrow upon the unbelievable sad news about the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We are mourning his demise together with the progressive humankind as well as with the Korean people. We express the deepest condolences to the Korean people.
					
					 The demise of Kim Jong Il is the greatest loss to the world people.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche started by President Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il will be certainly accomplished under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Although Kim Jong Il's heart stopped beating, his august name and feats will shine long in the history of humankind.
					
					 The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted an article titled "The Korean people are in greatest sorrow over the loss of their father" with his photo and the Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK an article titled "Demise of leader Kim Jong Il, world is in tears over the loss of peerlessly great man in history."
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in an article noted Kim Jong Il would always live as a beacon of the struggle for justice, solidarity, independence and peace and human cause against imperialism.

articles.title: Memorial Services for Kim Jong Il Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Memorial Services for Kim Jong Il Held in Foreign Countries

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Events were held in Ecuador, Russia and Mongolia between Dec. 21 and 23 to mourn the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were personages of different circles, members of organizations for the study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea and for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and masses in those countries. 
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Fernando Maldonado, member of the National Executive Committee of the Socialist Party-Ample Front of Ecuador, said Kim Jong Il was the great man recognized by the world and the greatest revolutionary in the present era.
					
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche idea, and Pavel Bilevski, scientific secretary of the association, praised Kim Jong Il as an example of a genuine popular leader and the sun of mankind.
					
					 A. Narangerel, director of Kim Jong Suk Kindergarten in Ulan Bator of Mongolia, spoke highly of the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il for the Korean revolution and global independence.
					
					 In the meantime, the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche idea set the period from Dec. 22 to 29 as a mourning period and decided to conduct multifarious activities praising his career and feats in memory of him.

articles.title: Anti-Japanese Women's Association Organized by Kang Pan Sok
articles.content:
Anti-Japanese Women's Association Organized by Kang Pan Sok

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, organized the Anti-Japanese Women's Association on December 26, Juche 15 (1926) under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 At that time the Korean women were in so poor plight, fettered by corrupt feudal society and the Japanese colonial rule. 
					
					From the period of his early revolutionary activities, the President had paid deep concern to emancipating the women from socio-political fetters, regarding them as a driving force of revolution. 
					
					 First of all, he decided to build an organization with hardcore women. 
					
					 True to the President's will, Kang Pan Sok made devoted efforts to organize the association in Fusong. 
					
					 She was elected chairwoman of the association. 
					
					 The association aimed to build socialist society in Korea and, for the present, throw the Japanese imperialists out of the country and achieve the independence of the nation and social emancipation of the women. 
					
					 Members of the association enhanced their revolutionary and class consciousness through night schools, discussions and short courses, while conducting political activities to rally many other women in the association.  
					
					 Thanks to their energetic activities, the association had its branches in many areas, including Fusong, Kalun, Guyushu, Wujiazi and the guerilla base near the River Tuman. 
					
					 The Anti-Japanese Women's Association creditably discharged its mission in winning the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Peruvian Organization

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" on its Internet homepage on Dec. 20.
					
					 The homepage also posted a photo of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994), clarifies the truth of socialism, the advantages of Korean style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche and principled issues arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: KPA Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
KPA Praised by Foreign Personages

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries between Dec. 13 and 17 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 94th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. They included lectures, film shows and book and photo exhibitions in Russia, Mongolia, India, Malaysia, Guinea and Democratic Congo.
					
					 On display in their venues were books and photos introducing the greatness and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and the woman commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Participants of the film shows watched Korean films including "Country Shining Thanks to the Army of Mt. Paektu".
					
					 The chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said in a lecture that Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA was an event of historic significance in defending and glorifying socialism.
					
					 He recalled that Kim Jong Il established the Songun politics as a basic political mode under socialism and steadily developed the political and ideological, military and technological capability of the KPA and the nation's defence industry.
					
					 The manager of a Malaysian rubber company noted that the DPRK turned into a military power, an invulnerable fortress which no one dares attack.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at Kankan University of Guinea noted that the history of the development of the KPA widely known as a matchless army is associated with the exploits performed by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk. He highly lauded the feats performed by her in building the army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media

					 Pyongyang, December 25 (KCNA) -- Papers and broadcasting services of various countries carried special write-ups and articles on Dec. 19 to mark the 20th anniversary of  Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Natun Bangla dedicated to the day an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il" illustrated with his portrait.
					
					 By having Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the KPA, the DPRK could make a dynamic advance along the road of socialism and demonstrate its might as an invincible power despite the imperialists' intensified moves to stifle it, the article said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, father of socialist Korea, formulating the Songun political mode, the first of its kind in the world history of politics.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics the political and ideological base of the DPRK grew stronger in all aspects and the single-minded unity of the Korean society became so solid that no nuclear weapon could ever break.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata carried an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il, 1991-2011" accompanied with a photo showing him acknowledging the cheers of paraders from the tribune of honor of Kim Il Sung Square.
					
					 A broadcasting service of Cambodia introduced the undying Songun leadership feats of the peerlessly great man two times.
					
					 The Guinean newspaper Horoya edited an article praising Kim Jong Il as ideal supreme commander possessed of high political caliber and extraordinary military qualifications illustrated with a picture showing his revolutionary activities.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia conducta inmoral de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia conducta inmoral de autoridades surcoreanas

					Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que las autoridades surcoreanas impiden obstinadamente la visita a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores para expresar condolencias por el fallecimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio el dia 25 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC: 
					
					Ahora la nacion coreana y todo el mundo estan entristecidos por el fallecimiento del Gran Hombre sin igual. 
					
					Esta de mas decir los profundos sentimientos de pesar del pueblo coreano.
					
					Los paises, que mantienen relaciones de amistad con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y las personalidades de distintos sectores de otros paises expresan profundas condolencias. 
					
					En el Sur de Corea tambien, las personalidades relacionadas con las cumbres intercoreanas de Pyongyang, los partidos politicos, las entidades y otros sectores publicaron notas de condolencias y manifiestan la voluntad de enviar al Norte (RPDC) grupos de visita para expresar pesame. 
					
					Tomando en consideracion tal deseo, dejamos abiertas la ruta terrestre via Kaesong y la via aerea para aceptar a todos los grupos y enviados surcoreanos que vengan para ese fin y tomamos las medidas para garantizarles el maximo confort y seguridad durante la visita. 
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas impiden obstinadamente la visita de distintos sectores que quieren compartir la tristeza con nuestro pueblo y tratan de enfriar el clima de condolencias justificando su conducta inmoral con unos disparates como "desvirtuar principios" y "provocar discrepancias entre las personas".
					
					Para colmo, el gobernante surcoreano actua con bajeza para socavar la ferrea unidad monolitica de la RPDC con este disparate conflictivo con esta: "separar a los habitantes norcoreanos de su direccion". 
					
					Ahora, toda la nacion coreana y todo el mundo estan consternados ante la conducta corrupta de las autoridades surcoreanas que faltan a la mas elemental cortesia y no tienen ni la minima fraternidad.
					
					Hasta hoy dia, el pueblo coreano esta indignado por el procedimiento antinacional del traidor Kim Young Sam que hace 17 anos, ofendio a los connacionales de la RPDC que deploraban el fallecimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, padre de la nacion.
					
					La RPDC no perdonara jamas a todos los tipejos que desautorizan la visita de condolencias de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores, calificandolos de criminales de pesima calana que insultan gravemente su maxima dignidad.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que su conducta inmoral producira consecuencias inimaginablemente catastroficas en las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Esta vez, toda la nacion coreana probara finalmente el estado de moralidad de las autoridades surcoreanas y su sinceridad en cuanto al mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.

articles.title: Continua el fluido de visitantes al Palacio Memorial Kumsusan
articles.content:
Continua el fluido de visitantes al Palacio Memorial Kumsusan

					Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Continua la visita de condolencias al Palacio Memorial Kumsusan donde reposa el cuerpo del Dirigente   Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El dia 25, visitaron ese lugar los funcionarios y trabajadores de ministerios, organos centrales, las provincias de Jagang, de Hamgyong del Sur y del Norte y de Ryanggang y de la ciudad de Rason. 
					
					Mientras se interpretaba la cancion funebre, fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Museo de la Revolucion Coreana, la Direccion de Sericultura y Seda, el Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental, la Direccion de Roturacion de Marismas, las delegaciones de condolencias de las provincias y la ciudad mencionadas, etc. 
					
					Llegados ante el feretro, los visitantes rompieron a llorar por haber perdido al padre de la nacion. 
					
					Tomaron la decision de convertir la gran tristeza en las fuerzas y coraje, unirse compactamente en torno al camarada Kim Jong Un enalteciendole como Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del ejercito y llevar a efecto el proyecto del Dirigente de construir un Estado prospero.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a todos a hacerse camaradas de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a todos a hacerse camaradas de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo en su edicion del dia 25 un comentario politico exhortando a todos a hacerse camaradas eternos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Despues de fallecido el Presidente Kim Il Sung,  el pueblo coreano pudo conocer el mundo de noble camaraderia en la imagen del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y en estas horas de duelo, lo hace en la figura del estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, senala el comentario y continua:
					
					Durante toda su vida, el Dirigente apreciaba tanto la palabra "camarada" y concluyo su vida con el calido companerismo. 
					
					Su vida demostro como debe vivir un camarada del Presidente Kim Il Sung y del pueblo.
					
					 Lo que quieren realmente las masas populares ha sido la pauta de actividades revolucionarias del Dirigente, su deseo y legado y la tarea que el nos ha asignado. 
					
					Todos nosotros, soldados revolucionarios del Dirigente, debemos cumplir todas las faenas, como labor ideologica, gestion economica, creacion cultural, produccion de articulos y modernizacion de la fabrica, en el principio de que ellas contribuyan sustancialmente al progreso de la patria y al bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					!Que Corea marche al frente del mundo! 
					
					Esto fue el proposito y aspiracion del Dirigente y el objetivo de la vida de todos nosotros que le debemos enaltecer con la mayor sinceridad y fidelidad. 
					
					Para llevar a feliz termino la sagrada causa revolucionaria mencionada en el Himno Nacional, el puso al estimado camarada Kim Jong Un, hijo joven del monte Paektu, al frente de nuestras filas revolucionarias.
					
					!Seamos camaradas eternos de Kim Jong Il!
					
					!Seamos eternos camaradas revolucionarios de  Kim Jong Un, sol del siglo XXI y gran camarada que asumio las responsabilidades de guia de todo el ejercito y pueblo en acato al legado del Dirigente!

articles.title: Pueblo coreano lamenta ausencia de estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano lamenta ausencia de estatua de bronce de Kim Jong Il

					Pyongyang, 25 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ahora, los habitantes de todo el pais lamentan mucho la falta de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					El periodico Rodong Sinmun divulgo hoy un articulo explicando lo ocurrido con ese tema.  
					
					En el 88 (1999) de la Era Juche, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea recibio las cartas de los militares del ejercito popular y habitantes y las propuestas escritas de los pueblos revolucionarios del mundo, las cuales insistian en la construccion de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente con motivo del 60o aniversario de su natalicio. 
					
					Los creadores prestigiosos de la Casa de Creacion Mansudae tambien enviaron en varias ocasiones al Comite Central del Partido el diseno de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente a ser erguida en la zona de Samjiyon de la provincia de Ryanggang. 
					
					Pero, el Dirigente rehuso esas peticiones afirmando que su unico deseo era lograr la reunificacion de la patria y construir una gran potencia prospera en el territorio patrio al continuar la causa revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Para cumplir el juramento que tomamos delante del feretro del difunto Presidente, nos quedan muchas otras tareas importantes como la construccion economica, el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y la reunificacion de la patria, apunto el Dirigente volviendo a rechazar la peticion de los funcionarios.
					
					El profesor de la Universidad Pedagogica         Kim Hyong Jik, Ri Sun Gu (de 43 anos de edad), dijo:
					
					"He leido ese articulo del diario Rodong Sinmun con ojos humedecidos.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il instruyo construir las estatuas de bronce de los combatientes, heroes de la epoca y martires patrioticos quienes contribuyeron a la liberacion y prosperidad de la patria, pero se puso renuente a levantar la suya. Realmente, el es patriota sin igual"
